original_text: And that is exactly what happened to him, for the people trampled him in the gateway, and he died.
korean_text: 그의 장관에게 그대로 이루어졌으니 곧 백성이 성문에서 그를 밟으매 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: And that is exactly what happened to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 바로 그에게 일어난 일입니다

sentences.original_text: for the people trampled him in the gateway
